scripts.test:parallel:chrome: npm run clean:reports-chrome && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail false "npm run test:login:chrome" "npm run test:registration:chrome" && npm-run-all test:merge-reports-chrome test:generate-report-chrome
scripts.test:parallel:firefox: npm run clean:reports-firefox && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail false "npm run test:login:firefox" "npm run test:registration:firefox" && npm-run-all test:merge-reports-firefox test:generate-report-firefox
scripts.test:all:chrome: npm run clean:reports-chrome && CYPRESS_REPORT_DIR=mochawesome-report-chrome npx cypress run --browser chrome || true && npm-run-all test:merge-reports-chrome test:generate-report-chrome
scripts.test:all:firefox: npm run clean:reports-firefox && CYPRESS_REPORT_DIR=mochawesome-report-firefox npx cypress run --browser firefox --headless || true && npm-run-all test:merge-reports-firefox test:generate-report-firefox
